name: Two button jam - game prototype
description:
A game prototype made for 8 Bits to Infinity ~ Two Button Jam .
The game idea is inspired by MoonPatrol.

The game is made in Java using the processing.org java library.

Music by Joshua McLean (Running, Two Buttons)

Controls: 
'1'  - Jump
'2' - Fire

Sourcecode: 
https://github.com/cluder/two-button-game-jam/
